mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_role (id, user_id, role_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, role_id, create_time, update_time from sys_user_role
